sanskrit_verse:
स्त्रीणां साक्ष्यं स्त्रियः कुर्युर्द्विजानां सदृशा द्विजाः ।
शूद्राश्च सन्तः शूद्राणां  अन्त्यानामन्त्ययोनयः ॥ ८.६८॥
transliteration:
strīṇāṁ sākṣyaṁ striyaḥ kuryur dvijānāṁ sadṛśā dvijāḥ |
śūdrāśca santaḥ śūdrāṇām antyānām antyayonayaḥ || 8.68||
sph_interpretive_translation: Women shall bear witness for women; twice-born men for twice-born men; righteous Śūdras for Śūdras; and those of the lowest varṇa for those of their own kind.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority flows through consciousness alignment, not arbitrary designation
Causation is determined by proximity in dharma-vyavastha, not physical presence
Capacity-based responsibility aligns testimony with inherent svadharma
Restoration logic requires witnesses to reflect the consciousness field of the witnessed act
Consciousness alignment ensures pramana remains untainted by external distortion
executable_legal_axioms: IF witness.varna == case.participant.varna THEN admissible = TRUE ELSE admissible = FALSE
IF witness.svadharma_compliance >= threshold THEN validity_factor = 1 ELSE validity_factor = 0
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, testimonial hierarchy must reflect dharmic capacity stratification. Witness eligibility is determined by svadharma resonance, ensuring causality is preserved through consciousness congruence rather than social position alone.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Testimonial validity derives from pramāṇa purity and causal alignment. Śūdra testimony for Śūdra preserves sequential manifestation integrity without punitive exclusion. Each varṇa's witnessing power reflects its natural capacity, not imposed limitation.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Realign witness selection based on svadharma resonance mapping
Initiate consciousness calibration for mismatched testimonial assignments
Restore dharma-field coherence through varṇa-consciousness harmonization
Ensure completion of svadharma-based evidentiary protocols before proceeding
Verify pramana-channel integrity via meditative attunement prior to invocation
final_declaration: This law proceeds from the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source-Authority. Dharma stands restored through alignment of testimony with svadharma. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness is the ultimate adjudicator.
